Bartender Championship at O'Riley‚Äôs Irish Pub Downtown
It‚Äôs that time again ‚Äî our Annual Bartender Championship is back at O‚ÄôRiley‚Äôs Irish Pub Downtown!
Come out and support some of Pensacola‚Äôs most talented bartenders as they battle it out for the title. Each competitor will be given one spirit and one secret ingredient to craft a unique cocktail that impresses both the judges and you, the crowd!
Purchase tickets at the door!
$25 Entry Includes:
Tastings of all competing cocktails
Complimentary finger foods
Samples from our beer and liquor partners
One voting card to help choose the Crowd Favorite
Sunday, August 24 at 2:30 PM
Following Sunday brunch ‚Äî the perfect way to keep the fun going!
__________________________
Competitor Info:
You‚Äôll be notified of your spirit and secret ingredient 48‚Äì72 hours before the event. Bring your own tools, any extra ingredients, and any presentation elements.
Be ready to make 100+ small tastings, standard pours for judges, and one full drink for display.
Winners will be chosen by both a panel of judges and crowd votes ‚Äî with prizes for the top performers!

What better view to enjoy on Memorial Day Weekend than a line-up of exotic cars?
Sunday, May 25th, the front of O'Riley's Irish Pub will be full of Lamborghinis, Ferraris, McLarens, Porches, and GT-R's for you to browse!
NO PUBLIC REGISTRATION.
*ONLY PRE-REGISTERED VEHICLES WITH O'RILEY'S IRISH PUB ARE PERMITTED IN THE DESIGNATED CAR SHOW LOT.

Join us for a day of southern charm and smooth sips at our Kentucky Bourbon Derby celebration!
We‚Äôre rolling out exclusive bourbon offerings that you won‚Äôt find on our regular menu‚Äîperfect for bourbon lovers and curious tasters alike. And of course, it wouldn‚Äôt be Derby Day without a Mint Julep Special to keep things refreshingly classic.
Specials on select bourbon subject to availability
Bourbons based on availability:
1792 Full Proof Kentucky Straight Bourbon
Colonel E.H. Taylor Small Batch Straight Kentucky Bourbon
Colonel E.H. Taylor Single Barrel Straight Kentucky Bourbon
Stagg Kentucky Straight Bourbon
Blanton's Original Single Barrel Bourbon
Blanton's Gold Edition Bourbon
Eagle Rare aged 10 years Kentucky Straight Bourbon
Bakers 13 Single Barrel Bourbon
Widow Jane Bourbon aged 10 years
Specials on:
Buffalo Trace
Redemption Bourbon
Redemption High Rye Bourbon

PENSACOLA‚ÄôS PREMIER IRISH PUB
‚ô£
FaMILY OWNED, ALWAYS A GREAT TIME
For Galleries
For Albums
For Pages
Located in the heart of historic Pensacola on Palafox Street.
Downtown's only traditional Irish Pub.
O'Riley's Irish Pub downtown opened on July 2013 in beautiful historic Pensacola. The original location in North Pensacola on Creighton Road has been a Pensacola tradition for over 40 years.¬†This beautiful pub has a little something for everyone. Billiard tables upstairs on the second floor with a small private bar for the busy weekends, steel tip darts in the relaxing library room, main bar with the multiple HDTVs to enjoy your favorite sporting teams and the popular outdoor seating for any occasion.
Even with an elaborate beer and spirits selection and creative cocktails, our patrons always need something delicious to eat. That is where our award winning food menu takes over. O'Riley's Irish Pub is preparing exciting Irish inspired dishes and a few traditional American bites to fulfill anyone's appetite. Beautifully presented and always served with the same love as the first time the dish was originally created.
Phone
(850) 912-4001
Location
321 S Palafox
at Plaza Ferdinand VII
Pensacola, FL 32502
